item.description:
Event Description: Supporters Of Ron Paul,

Here we go!
This is the first of many explosions you will be able to participate in. The first "Ron Paul Money Bomb" is set to go off this Saturday (10/20/2007) between 1pm and 2pm EST.

We are all being asked to donate $25.00 or more between the hours of 1pm and 2pm THIS SATURDAY! If you wont be near your computer on Saturday afternoon you most certainly can donate anytime! The goal is to have a 1 Million Dollar Money Boost -- That means 40,000 donations of $25.00!
I think we can do better than that!
Donate as much as you can afford for this event!
Most of you get paid on Thursday or Friday-
The IRS took its "share"-
How about putting $25.00 or more towards a GOOD CAUSE!

RonPaul2008.com/Donate
or
1-877-RON-2008

Join the email list-- simply email: ronpaulmoneybomb@yahoo.com
Tell them you'll be participating!
item.name: Money Bomb
